name: Supermarket Run!
description:
A small game I made in a day for the MashUp Game Jam 2!

The game is about going to the supermarket...with bananas....grab everything from your list and get out of there!

Throw bananas at the cops to stun them!
Grab all the items before the timer runs out! Watch out, if you grab the wrong item you will lose time.

Controls ->

  • WASD - Move
  • Left Mouse - Throw Banana
  • E - Pick Up Item

Pick Up Items ->

  •    Apples
  •    Bottle
  •    Eggs   
  •    Bread
  •    Milk
  •    TP
  •    Candy
  •    Coke
